title: Create GigMarket landing website with 5 dashboard pages

requirements.text: Create hero section with app name 'GigMarket', tagline 'Hire trusted local workers easily', two CTA buttons ('Download APK' and 'Get Started'), and illustration showing workers in construction, factory, and school staff roles

quotes: App name: GigMarket
Tagline: "Hire trusted local workers easily"
Buttons: Download APK, Get Started
Illustration showing workers (construction, factory, school staff)
